metadata.Title: CVE-2022-3813 on Ubuntu 23.10 (mantic) - medium.
metadata.Description: A vulnerability classified as problematic has been found in Axiomatic Bento4. This affects an unknown part of the component mp4edit. The manipulation leads to memory leak. It is possible to initiate the attack remotely. The exploit has been disclosed to the public and may be used. The associated identifier of this vulnerability is VDB-212679.

notes.Note: alexmurray> kodi-inputstream-adaptive contains an embedded copy of bento4

criterions.comment: kodi-inputstream-adaptive package in mantic is affected and may need fixing.
